title: Folk dances today
creator_credit: F A Film Associates and Mario Casetto
brief_description: At a teenagers’ dance party it is the “in” thing to do Greek and Armenian line dances, the Swedish “hambo”, middle eastern “debkas”, and Bulgarian “kolos”. The film cuts away to show each ethnic dance, or type, performed by exhibition groups with authentic styling in national costumes.
